name: Shots Fired (itch)
description:
They took everything away from you. Your wife, your daughter, and your TV. You are left with a bullet, a rifle...and a target. One miss, and it's all over!

Shots Fired is a sniper shooter game where you take the role of a vengeful assassin because why not? Your mission? Take down your targets using a single bullet.

  • Use your sniper rifle and hunt down your target. Do it fast, do it clean!
  • Build your fortune and rep by taking on missions at the nearest Job Market!
  • 90 days, 15 EXE's, 1 Bingo Board. Will you rise up to the challenge and finish 'em all?
  • Upgrade your rifle, use cool power-ups. No more bullets? Boohoo-- or you can just get more from the Shop!
